## serialization.workspaceComments.WorkspaceCommentSerializer class

Serializer for saving and loading workspace comment state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class WorkspaceCommentSerializer implements ISerializer 
```
**Implements:** [ISerializer](./blockly.serialization.iserializer.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clear(workspace)](./blockly.serialization.workspacecomments.workspacecommentserializer.clear.md) |  | Disposes of any comments that exist on the given workspace. |
|  [load(state, workspace)](./blockly.serialization.workspacecomments.workspacecommentserializer.load.md) |  | Deserializes the comments defined by the given state into the given workspace. |
|  [save(workspace)](./blockly.serialization.workspacecomments.workspacecommentserializer.save.md) |  | Returns the state of all workspace comments in the given workspace. |
